Description: Tapestry medallion of the bust of a female with curly dark hair, wearing a pink dress and beige, blue, yellow and green mantle; she wears a diadem, ear-rings with pearls and pendant?; above her head there are two vegetal ornaments in a stylised leaf-shape, in light green, red, yellow and dark blue; between them is a heart-shaped motif in beige, yellow and red; the central scene is circled by a freize of yellow, green, red and orange geometric motifs; and a plain red band; tapestry on grouped threads: warp-bleached linen? (S spun Z ply/13), weft-unbleached linen? (S/44), yellow, orange, red, light green, green, blue and dark blue wool (Z/red is 72); two simple edges are preserved, the others are cut
Exhibition history: 2018-2019 11 Oct- 27 Jan, London, Tate Modern, Anni Albers
